name: Novas Las Aventurietas del Robercleiton: o Renascimento do TURBO
description: This game is a Brazilian comedy game, an RPG produced in RPG Maker. Its is an turn based combat, with many simple side quests. The game tell the history of Robercleiton that wants to be more than an non playable character, like a hero, gain level and save the world from darkness, or not...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Placa de Video Onboard Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: Placa de Som Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 98 Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Placa de Video Onboard Storage: 60 MB available space Sound Card: Placa de Som Onboard
